50'000 VIEWS 👍😀🎉🎉 I can't say it enough. Thank You for the amazing support and stay tuned for many awesome videos.

@L1nu5_W3hrl3 #PCMasterRace 😂👍 It probably looks incredible on the PC. But I'm a PS4 type of guy.
Just played some amazing rounds in Battlefield 1. If anyone ever wants to join in #PS4 Gamertag: badboy0527 👍🔥😂
Thanks for the support on my latest video. I appreciate it 👍👍👍
Going to be teaching my younger brother how to edit videos tomorrow. Should be a fun day 😂😂😂
I was thinking about picking up Resident Evil 7 but I just can't I freakin hate jump scares 😂👍Maybe I'll pick up Prey when it comes out.

Sorry uploaded the wrong video 😋 Better video with music going up now !!! #YouTubeProblems
@OnePlus_Support My problem is finally solved ☺️👍 Thanks to my carrier and my Dad. I can enjoy mobile data again !!! #NeverSettle
New video going up today for those of you wondering how/where you can pick up an awesome @oneplus device 👍☺️
@OnePlus_Support Hello OnePlus ☺️ I have sent you my ticket number via DM so check your inbox. Thanks
@patty1987 @OnePlus_Support Hopefully they're going to release an update with some bug fixesASAP it's annoying considering it's a new device
@patty1987 @OnePlus_Support Hey Andrew👍I'm having a similar enough issue the only problem is I have zero mobile data it just doesn't connect
@OnePlus_Support Take a look at your DM's for more info into the matter. Thanks
@OnePlus_Support I DM'd you guys check your DM inbox.
Quick update guys with the mobile data connection issue: I performed a factory reset and still nothing refrain from doing this if affected.😠
@OnePlus_Support Hey guys !!! I'm going to work tomorrow and I need my mobile data connection to work on the 3T please help me out !!! 😔👍
@OnePlus_Support Hey guys I DM'd you in relation to my mobile data problem. Thanks 👍
📱 To all of my viewers considering to upgrade to 7.0 on 3/3T be aware of a "no connection to mobile data issue." I can't seem to connect? 💥
@OnePlus_Support Hey guys I sent you a DM in relation to a mobile data problem. Do you mind checking it out Thank You 👍
I have to wake up pretty early in the morning so I guess that's me done for the day !!! Have a great weekend everyone 😴 And enjoy the video.
